text: innama l-mu'minuna alladhina amanu bil-lahi warasulihi wa-idha kanu ma平ahu 平ala amrin jami平in lam yadhhabu hatta yastadhinuhu inna alladhina yastadhinunaka ulaika alladhina yu'minuna bil-lahi warasulihi fa-idha is'tadhanuka liba平di shanihim fadhan liman shi'ta min'hum wa-is'taghfir lahumu l-laha inna l-laha ghafurun rahimun
